mean_cn: v.支援；支撑；  n.支持；支持者，支撑物
mean_en: encouragement and help that you give to somebody/something because you approve of them and want them to be successful
sentence: Doctors and resources are being sent from other areas to support this province.
sentence_trans: 其他地区派遣医生、运送物资来支援这个省。
word_etyma: sup在…下面 + port带 → 带来支持 → support支持
